name: Who cares if it's buggy, just ship it!
name_original: Who cares if it's buggy, just ship it!
description:
Ludum Dare 45 entry

Theme: Start with nothing

The most highly anticipated and immersive MMORPG/RTS of 2019.
Brought to you by the studio that bought you titles like Climb Princess Climb and Shank the World, we are proud to present our latest masterpiece Who Cares if it's Buggy, Just Ship it!
